page.title: Page1
page.text: [[Page2]] is a good page. [[Page3]] is also a decent page. [[Page4]] shouldn't be forgotten.

page.text: [[Page3]] has interesting information. [[Page4]] is pretty interesting too.

page.text: [[Page1]] is the only page that I care about.

page.text: [[Page1]] is cool, but so is [[Page3]] too.
